content.body:
Fish is one of the most flexible and delicate ingredients you can use. When buying fish, please try and buy responsibly, thinking of the impact of your purchase on the planet. I avoid the following because of their increasing scarcity:
Cod Tuna Swordfish Flying fish
Organic salmon is also worth paying the extra for - it's not that glow in the dark pink colour for a start!
I hope you enjoy these recipes and please contact me if you've got any you'd like to share.
